experience: You and Kevin both know Amanda Vega, Lance Faulkner, CSM, CSPO, and 77 others

Rufus Creative offers clients over 20 years of marketing, advertising and production experience. We take pride in listening to our client's needs, then developing and implementing a plan that will achieve and exceed their goals with full-service creative solutions. We are on time, on budget and we guarantee our work.

Developed, implemented and managed a full-service production company within an established  advertising agency that Increased company revenue and profit margins while making the company, as a whole, better able to respond to and meet our clients needs.During my tenure at SMP I  also managed a $500,000 equipment expansion which enabled me to implement an outside sales program focused on developing new revenue streams. This resulted in a 40% increase in division profits with over 1.3 million dollars in revenue annually.
Top producing Account Manager/Producer.Devloped profitable new business sectors.Improved company visability and reputation in the communiy.
